long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a tool to check if your design works well with knowledge of how users interact with mobile devices. The extension currently supports the following device sizes: Iphone 5 and Iphone 6 plus. More are to be added as soon as possible.

The extension adds a css layer to your current Chrome tab which acts as a 'heatmap' that shows what the users will be able to reach either, easily, strenuously or hardly.
